#USER# #USER# Interesting fact: Red hair and blue eyes are both recessive genes. It's very rare that they occur together. Most redheads have hazel, green or light brown eyes. Blue eyes/red hair happens in less than 1% of the population. It's one of the rarest hair/eye color combos.
